Sentencas: The Ruddlesden-Popper phase lanthanum nickelate, La2NiO4+delta (LNO), offers excellent material properties as a cathode for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Low-temperature processing technique of Ruddlesden-Popper cathode for high-performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, taking full advantage of its intrinsic properties is difficult in realistic cells because of its high chemical reactivity with the electrolyte at elevated tempera-tures.
Titulo: Low-temperature processing technique of Ruddlesden-Popper cathode for high-performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Herein, we demonstrate high-performance SOFCs with an LNO-based cathode fabricated by a low-temperature processing route that suppresses harmful chemical reactions.
Titulo: Low-temperature processing technique of Ruddlesden-Popper cathode for high-performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The sintering capability of the composite cathode composed of LNO and gadolinia-doped ceria (GDC) was enhanced by mixing Fe-based sintering additive with GDC, which formed reliable interfacial bonding with the electrolyte at a temperature similar to 200 degrees C below the typical processing temperature.
Titulo: Low-temperature processing technique of Ruddlesden-Popper cathode for high-performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Because no interdiffusion between cathode and electrolyte occurs at such low temperatures, the cell is successfully fabricated without diffusion blocking layer, which simplifies the cell structure and manufacturing process.
Titulo: Low-temperature processing technique of Ruddlesden-Popper cathode for high-performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell with the LNO-based cathode outperformed state-of-the-art cells, particularly at lower operating temperatures.
Titulo: Low-temperature processing technique of Ruddlesden-Popper cathode for high-performance solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results highlight that the processing parameters strongly affect the electrochemical performance of this LNO-based cathode and must be carefully engineered to fully exploit its superior intrinsic properties.
Titulo: Low-temperature processing technique of Ruddlesden-Popper cathode for high-performance solid oxide fuel cells
